room_title: Escape room "The Motel" by Escape Mystery Rooms in Little Rock
room_description:
The Blue Merit Motel has had 3 guests go missing from room 140.  One of them is a friend of yours.  Even though you are a top-notch investigator your boss pulled you from the case because of the conflict of interest.

You have only 1 hour to sneak into the room to do your own investigation before your boss catches you.

Can you discover how these people are disappearing and get out yourself before you are discovered?
